body_content.explanation: the work of the police force:
examples: Policing differs from town to town, from country to country.
Policing resources are of much better use when directed toward crime prevention.

body_content.explanation: the job of controlling or guarding a public event or area using members of the police or a similar force:
examples: The policing of demonstrations will be far tougher than two months ago.
Increased policing of the border has had some good results.

body_content.explanation: the job of controlling the way in which something is done:
examples: The new Bill will tighten up the policing of pension funds.
The policing of home builders has been left to understaffed and overworked local building departments.
